feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023
